content: simple 10-petal afghan square by joyce d lewis this 9 inch square was made using red heart super saver lilac dark plum and light raspberry worsted weight yarn and a size h hook super tester muffetsmom used red heart holiday and a size g hook for her 9 inch square your size will vary depending upon your yarn hook and gauge this pattern uses us terms throughout special stitches v_stitch 2 double_crochet chain 3 2 double_crochet in chain-2 space picot chain 2 insert hook under front horizontal loop and front vertical loop of last double_crochet made yarn over and pull through stitch yarn over and pull through two loops on hook long double_crochet ldc double_crochet worked into stitch one round below current round half_double_crochet tack half_double_crochet tack slip hook through two vertical loops at back of picot then under chain yo and pull loop to front yo and pull through all loops on hook double triple crochet stitch dtr yarn over three times insert hook in top of indicated stitch yarn over and pull through stitch yo and pull through two loops 4 times front post single_crochet fpsc insert hook from front right to left under the post of the indicated stitch yarn over and pull loop to front yo and pull through both loops on hook © 2012 joyce d lewis simple 10-petal afghan square page 1 of 3 instructions round 1 with color a form a sliding circle chain 3 counts as first double_crochet 19 double_crochet into circle close the circle slip_stitch in beginning chain to join 20 double_crochet round 2 chain 6 counts as treble_crochet chain 2 treble_crochet in each of next 2 double_crochet chain 2 9 times treble_crochet in next double_crochet slip_stitch in fourth st of beginning chain to join 10 pairs of treble_crochet 10 chain-2 spaces place a stitch marker at the top of the beginning chain for use in the final round which is worked on the surface of the finished block round 3 slip_stitch into next chain-2 space chain 3 double_crochet chain 3 2 double_crochet in same space 2 double_crochet chain 3 2 double_crochet in next chain-2 space 9 times slip_stitch in beginning chain-3 to join 10 v-stitches round 4 4 double_crochet picot 4 double_crochet in next chain-3 space slip_stitch in between v stitches 10 times slip_stitch in beginning double_crochet to join 10 petals fasten_off round 5 attach color b with ldc in space between any two of the petals chain 6 behind petal ldc into space below between v stitches in round 3 9 times chain 6 slip_stitch in beginning ldc to join 10 ldc 10 chain-6 round 6 see special stitches for half_double_crochet tack chain 2 counts as half_double_crochet 3 half_double_crochet half_double_crochet tack 3 half_double_crochet in next chain-6 space half_double_crochet in next ldc 9 times 3
